name: AMERICAN CAR RENTAL ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Any and all legislation or regulation regarding recalls of motor vehicles, including but not limited to regulation of vehicles in the fleets of car rental companies
Any and all legislation to reauthorize the Federal Aviation Administration, including H.R.4, H.R. 2997 and S. 1405
Any and all legislation to prohibit the imposition of car rental excise taxes and federal revenue diversion policy, including but not limited to, H.R. 2404 and H.R. 2997.
Any and all legislation related to federal regulation of highly autonomous vehicles, including but not limited to S. 1885 and H.R. 3388
Any and all bills and proposals relating to federal tax reform, including, but not limited to, repeal of like kind exchanges and full expensing of capital expenditures
